name: "Superman and Batman: Generations" : 2 Trivia Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Chuck.

	The Blackhawks were a multiethnic team of crack pilots who fought against the Nazis in World War II. They had no superpowers and were lead by the Polish man Blackhawk.

questions.text: It's 1953. Which Green Lantern responds to Superman's distress call?
questions.explanation:
Abin Sur.

	Superman is stranded along with an enslaved alien race on a planet with a red sun. Under a red sun, Superman has no powers, so he must call in extra help. Abin Sur is best known for giving Hal Jordan his power ring.

questions.text: It's 1964. Who is NOT a member of the new Justice League of America?
questions.explanation:
Superman.

	Kid Flash, Supergirl, Robin and Wonder Girl form together to make the Justice League of America. On their first outing, they beat Mirror Master, Weather Wizard and Gorilla Grodd!

questions.text: It's 1975. Which ghost is menacing Joker?
questions.explanation:
Dick Grayson.

	Grayson, while being Batman, was killed by one of the Joker's traps. In his old age, Joker's misdeeds have finally come back to haunt him, and it takes Deadman and the ghost of Alfred Pennyworth to convince Grayson to stop.

questions.text: It's 1986. Which villain is Batman tracking down?
questions.explanation:
Hyena.

	The Hyena is a female villain who fancies herself the equal of Two-Face, Joker, and the rest of Batman's vintage villains. She and her henchmen are easily beaten by the third Batman, Bruce Wayne, Jr.

questions.text: It's 1997. Batman's Robin has decided to take a new name for himself. What is it?
questions.explanation:
Knightwing.

	Bruce Wayne, Jr. is preparing to pass the Batman mantle on to his adoptive son, Clark. The younger Wayne opts to blaze his own path and take a new name for himself.

False.

	Clark Wayne, secretly Knightwing, marries the reformed villain Amanda Mason, who went by the name of Ransak. He stopped her destructive rampage and sent her to jail for ten years.

questions.text: It's 2019. Who do we see first on the chronoscope?
questions.explanation:
Jonathan Kent.

	A chronoscope is a device used to view the past. With it, Superman revealed to Batman that he knew his parents would be killed by a robber.  Batman's parents knew it as well, and still didn't change a thing.

Ultra-Humanite.

	When they are both nine, Bruce and Superboy cross paths. Ultra-Humanite planned on kidnapping Bruce for ransom, but didn't count on the interference of Superboy!

questions.text: When fighting alongside Superboy, a young Bruce Wayne donned a costume and called himself the Flying Bat.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Wayne called himself the Flying Fox, not the Flying Bat. Superboy thought it appropriate, as a flying fox is a kind of bat. Using the chronoscope, he already knew Wayne would grow up to become Batman.
